post.text: Labor Day is a long-standing tradition celebrating the American worker but with millions of Americans out of work, we must do something to get America back to work. As President I will end bad trade deals and bring back American jobs for our people! #AmericaFirst!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Stupid and idiot Trump, in God and Arabs I trust you won't be elected

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Attention hillary supporters....prove your intelligence...defend her relationship with George soros and her support of globalism

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: We the people have had enough!! We will NOT bow to the globalist agenda of hillary and soros! We will join together as ONE to take our country back on November 8th! We stand for justice against the corruption, the lies, and the division of American citizens! All corrupt, career politicians must go! Nationalism not globalism! Trump/Pence 2016 Voting for Hillary is voting for civil war. The majority of Americans are fed up with government control and oppression. Tired of them trying to divide us by any means possible to succeed at their corrupt agenda. There is corruption on both sides and at every level. We are sick of being sold to foreign governments and elites for profit. If hillary cheats her way to a win the majority will not take it lying down.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: No, in fact I don't support Hillary jajaja, I Just be against the people who supports the discrimination, hates women, not appreciate the good relations between Latin countries and not values the environment, who prefers the economy above nature and the weapons above humanity. So, you can't say to me HILLARY SUPPORTER when you don't know me
